vn.tungdx.mediapicker

类 MediaAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • CursorAdapter
      • vn.tungdx.mediapicker.MediaAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.AbsListView.RecyclerListener

    public class MediaAdapter
extends CursorAdapter
implements android.widget.AbsListView.RecyclerListener
    Adapter for display media item list.

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected(android.net.Uri uri)
        Check media uri is selected or not.
        参数:
        uri - Uri of media item (photo, video)
        返回:
        true if selected, false otherwise.

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected(MediaItem item)
        Check MediaItem is selected or not.
        参数:
        item - MediaItem to check.
        返回:
        true if selected, false otherwise.

      • setMediaSelected

        参数:
        item - Item to update.
